com.samskivert.velocity
Class InvocationContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.velocity.context.AbstractContext
      org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext
          com.samskivert.velocity.InvocationContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.apache.velocity.context.Context, org.apache.velocity.context.InternalEventContext
public class InvocationContext
extends org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext

The invocation context provides access to request related information as well as being the place where objects are placed to make them available to the template.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a new invocation context instance with the supplied http request and response objects.

getTemplate

public org.apache.velocity.Template getTemplate(String path,
                                                String encoding)
                                         throws Exception
Fetches a Velocity template that can be used for later formatting. The template is read with the specified encoding or the default encoding if encoding is null.

Throws:
Exception - thrown if an error occurs loading or parsing the template.

putAllParameters

@Deprecated
public void putAllParameters()
Deprecated. 

Don't use this method. It is terribly unsafe and was written by a lazy engineer.

encodeAllParameters

public String encodeAllParameters()
Encodes all the request params so they can be slapped onto a different URL which is useful when doing redirects.
